body_html:
It sounds like it should be possible, but we'll need someone with more CMake expertise to suggest a fix, so I'll mark this as "contributions welcome".

As a potential lead, the UPDATE_DISCONNECTED option seems relevant:

  • https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/5bbcf76399e107bbb1712ba8aeee27c160413d2d/Modules/ExternalProject.cmake#L320-L338
  • https://stackoverflow.com/q/36254658/3574081
body_text:
It sounds like it should be possible, but we'll need someone with more CMake expertise to suggest a fix, so I'll mark this as "contributions welcome".
As a potential lead, the UPDATE_DISCONNECTED option seems relevant:

https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/5bbcf76399e107bbb1712ba8aeee27c160413d2d/Modules/ExternalProject.cmake#L320-L338
https://stackoverflow.com/q/36254658/3574081
body:
It sounds like it should be possible, but we'll need someone with more CMake expertise to suggest a fix, so I'll mark this as "contributions welcome".

As a potential lead, the `UPDATE_DISCONNECTED` option seems relevant:

* https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/5bbcf76399e107bbb1712ba8aeee27c160413d2d/Modules/ExternalProject.cmake#L320-L338
* https://stackoverflow.com/q/36254658/3574081
